The language combines two unusual design philosophies: Forth-style postfix stack execution and Lisp-style symbolic processing. Because of this hybrid model, HP-RPL is capable of symbolic algebra, numeric computing, matrix manipulation, graphing, recursion, and even creating custom calculator apps ‚Äî all inside a handheld device. This post provides an overview of the highlighted features in
articles.author: Inconnu

articles.title: Vue 2 is Approaching End Of Life
articles.description: With 2024 almost upon us, we would like to take this opportunity to remind the Vue community that Vue 2 will reach End of Life (EOL) on December 31st, 2023. Vue 2.0 was released more than 7 years ago in 2016. It was a major milestone in Vue's journey of becoming a mainstream framework. Many current Vue users started using Vue during the Vue 2 era, and many great things have been built with it. However, active maintenance of two major versions in parallel isn't sustainable for us. As Vue 3 and it
articles.author: Inconnu

articles.title: Volar: a New Beginning
articles.description: Most users of Volar know it as the official Vue.js VSCode extension. It started as a personal project when the official recommendation was still Vetur, and over time got adopted as the new official extension due to improved architecture and performance. As a project created to improve the quality of life for developers, we spent over two years before reaching 1.0, and have been continuously shipping stability improvements. But we've still got more work to do, and there are exciting plans for 202
articles.author: Inconnu
